page.title: 02ECOLOGY
page.content: {We studied Shirtcliff Woods where we saw plenty of plants and wildlife. The birds we saw were sparrows, blackbirds,thrushes,magpies and jays. We saw a badger set and rat holes but no sign of life of either. Wildlife is being disturbed by vandals , motorbikes and the public think it's a nice place to take the dog for a walk and for some fresh air. Horses are kept in small fields fenced in by barbed wire which we think is cruel.Farmers grow grass which will eventually be fed to the horses. The community is peaceful and very clean.The neighbours are very friendly.Some trees which we saw were silver birch,oak,chestnut and fir.
